meanings.sent1: She is part of the antinukes movement.
meanings.sent2: The antinukes activists protested outside the nuclear plant.
meanings.sent3: The antinukes group had a peaceful rally against nuclear weapons.
meanings.sent4: Her antinukes stance was unwavering in the face of opposition.
meanings.sent5: The antinukes symbol on their banner was a powerful statement.

meanings.definition: A person or group who advocates against the use of nuclear weapons.
meanings.sent1: The antinukes gathered to discuss their strategies.
meanings.sent2: She became an antinukes after learning about the dangers of nuclear war.
meanings.sent3: The antinukes shared informative pamphlets about nuclear disarmament.
meanings.sent4: He was known in the community as a dedicated antinukes.
meanings.sent5: The antinukes group made a difference with their peaceful protests.
